login.title: Sealbox
login.subtitle: Connect to your secret management server

steps.enterDetails: Enter server URL and token above

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid server URL
errors.authFailed: Authentication failed, please check your token
errors.connectionFailed: Unable to connect to server, please check the URL

secrets.title: Secret Management
secrets.description: Manage your encrypted secrets and sensitive data
secrets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete secret "{{key}}" version {{version}}?
secrets.deleteFailedDescription: Unable to delete secret. Please try again.
secrets.deleteSuccessDescription: Secret "{{key}}" version {{version}} has been deleted successfully
secrets.createSecretDescription: Store a new encrypted secret with optional expiration
secrets.secretNameHelp: Use letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens only
secrets.secretValueHelp: This will be encrypted before storage
secrets.enableTtlDescription: Automatically delete this secret after a specified time
secrets.encryptionInfoDescription: Your secret will be encrypted using envelope encryption with RSA + AES-GCM
secrets.createFailedDescription: Unable to create secret. Please try again.
secrets.viewSecretDescription: View encrypted secret details and content
secrets.secretHidden: Secret content is hidden for security
secrets.copiedToClipboardDescription: Secret content has been copied to your clipboard
secrets.copyFailedDescription: Unable to copy to clipboard. Please try again.
secrets.securityInfoDescription: This secret is decrypted client-side using your private key. Server never sees plaintext.
secrets.editSecretDescription: Update secret content and create a new version
secrets.secretNameReadonly: Secret name cannot be changed during editing
secrets.updateFailedDescription: Unable to update secret. Please try again.
secrets.versioningInfoDescription: This will create a new version of the secret. Previous versions remain accessible unless expired.

keys.title: Master Key Management
keys.description: Manage RSA key pairs for envelope encryption
keys.noKeysFoundDescription: Register your first RSA key pair to start encrypting secrets
keys.registerComingSoonDescription: RSA key registration will be available in the next update
keys.rotateComingSoonDescription: Master key rotation will be available in the next update
keys.securityNoteDescription: Master keys use 2048-bit RSA encryption. Your private key should be kept secure and never shared.

errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or is under development
errors.errorBoundaryDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
